item.description:
T Harve Eker blitzed on the scene as the author of the N.Y. Times #1 Bestseller Secrets of the Millionaire Mind: Mastering The Inner Game of Wealth. 

"If your inner money thermostat is not preset for a high level of success, you will never amass a large amount of money. And if by some stroke of luck or hard work you do, you'll somehow manage to lose it so your finances return to your internal set point."


He's created the 3-Day Millionaire Mind Intensive Seminar, to retrain your thinking for good as you discover the secrets of the affluent & successful & much, much more.


When: Feb 25 - 27

(Even if you can only attend for some days & not all 3 days, worth going.)


Current Limited Offer ( Regular price: $795 ):

- General Seating FREE

- Premium Seating $97

- VIP Seating $297

Go here to check it out!  (Will give more info about different goodies you get when u pay)

This is the first time the seminar is in Boston (YAY!). A lot of us had to hit the road to NYC & pay for lodging to attend the seminar in the past.

**Note: If you decide to attend, please also RSVP here (on our event page) & meetup at the seminar.


"I have witnessed & admired T Harv Eker's work for years. I highly recommend this work for anyone seeking to increase their finanical, mental & emotinoal wealth" -- Jack Canfield, author of Chicken Soup series & The Success Principles, Master Teacher on The Secret movie


"Secrets of the Millionaire Mind demystifies why some people are designed to be rich while others are destined for a life of struggle. If you want to learn about the root cause of success, learn from Harv." -- Robert G. Allen, author of Multiple Streams of Income, and The One Minute Millionaire


"Study Harv's work as if your life depended on it...financially it may!" -- Anthony Robbins, the world's #1 Peak Performance coach


"T. Harv Eker is a master at making the road to riches simple. Finally his powerul principles are available in this amazing seminar " -- Marci Shimoff, coauthor, Chicken Soup for the Woman's Soul, Love For No Reason +

See you at the Seminar! Details here...

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: T Harv Eker (NYT Bestseller)'s Millionaire Mind Intensive Seminar - FREE
